value.title: Refresh Power BI every second or minute!
value.excerpt: In today's video I am going to show you how to refresh Power BI every minute or any interval you yet :). As with everything, there are some limitations but it doesnt require a premium license.  #curbal #powerbi  Link to the blog post: https://bigintsolutions.com/2019/03/29/refresh-power-bi-report-every-min-and-show-on-a-tv/

value.title: Update Power BI Desktop automatically
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to install power bi desktop so you get automatic downloads every time the power Bi team releases a new version.  The great thing about this is that you dont need to have administrator rights on your computer to get the download. Great if you are a big company right?

value.title: DAX for Power BI - Calculate Cumulative Sum (Running Total) of Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: The cumulative total is also known as Running total and during this video, we will talk about how we can calculate a cumulative sum for request count using Power BI Dax measure in Power BI.  During this session, we will cover the following things: • Real-life example where we need Cumulative Sum 00:21

value.title: Debugging a slow Power BI report with Phil Seamark

value.title: Demystifying Custom Partitions in Power BI
value.excerpt: We talk about Incremental Refresh a lot, but what if you need custom partitions in Power BI? How do you even create those? They look scary! Patrick takes the mystery away and walks you through how you can create them.  Partitions in tabular models https://docs.microsoft.com/analysis-services/tabular-models/partitions-ssas-tabular

value.title: Migrate your Paginated reports to Power BI
value.excerpt: Are your paginated reports still on-premises with either Power BI Report Server or SQL Server Reporting Services? Want to move them to Power BI? Patrick shows you how you can do that using the RDLMigration tool!  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/guidance/migrate-ssrs-reports-to-power-bi
